summary: SummaryM·A·Cximal Silky Matte Lipstick Mini M·A·C is an iconic creamy lipstick that has been maxed out to give lips MORE with a pigment-rich, full coverage colour and a silky-matte finish. Get more longwear with 12 hours of lasting colour, and 8 hours of moisture that leaves lips looking visibly fuller.
details: DetailsBenefitsConditions and nourishes lipsImmediate and 8-hour moistureComfortable formulaLong-wearing and color-true, 12 hoursNon-feathering and non-bleeding, 12 hoursNon-flaking and non-caking, 12 hoursIconic matte lipstick that changed the world we live in may have been reimagined, but each famous and fresh hue still serves up that signature vanilla scent you already loveKey IngredientsCoconut Oil, Organic Shea & Cocoa Butter: Helps to condition and and nourish lipsResearch Results98% said this lipstick feels comfortable throughout wear*95% said this lipstick provides high impact colour throughout wear96% said this lipstick leaves lips feeling soft/smooth**96% said this lipstick feels luxurious****Consumer testing on 120 women after using product for 1 week.**Consumer testing on 109 women after using product for 1 week.***Consumer testing on 110 women after using product for 1 week.Item 2624227How To UseApply Lipstick directly to lips.Pro tip: Define lips with Lip Pencil or layer on Lipglass for a high-shine finish.Pro tip: Dab Lipstick on cheeks for a monochomatic pop of color.Pro tip: Dab on cheeks for a monochomatic pop of color.IngredientsOctyldodecanol, Neopentyl Glycol Diheptanoate, Synthetic Wax, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Trimethylpentanediol/Adipic Acid/Glycerin Crosspolymer, Silica, Microcrystalline Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax\ Copernicia Cerifera Cera \Cire De Carnauba, Boron Nitride, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, 15850), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Red 30 Lake (CI 73360), Red 33 Lake (CI 17200), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985)]Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: This color absolutely worked well with my skin tone and brown hair. I'm tan right now but I can see it going well with my skin tone in the winter.  I bought the mini size to just try it but love how it small enough to fit in my smaller bags. Will be ordering in the regular size.

reviews.headline: Dry
reviews.comments: It tugs my lips during application it's so dry compared to my other mac lipsticks

reviews.headline: Mini lipstick perfection
reviews.comments: Mac lipsticks always deliver. The mini size is super convenient for my purse!

reviews.headline: Great purchase
reviews.comments: I bought two shades : Mehr and Velvet teddy . Both of them , in my opinion , are very basic and great for everyday wearing . The texture is silky and do not make my lips dry . I believe that these ones are going  to be my new favorites.

reviews.headline: My mini Love
reviews.comments: It's mini, it's matte, it fits in my small bags… in love!!

reviews.headline: A new fave!
reviews.comments: Decided to try out this mini, before purchasing the full-size, and I'm sold! I usually only wear glossy lip stuff because regular lipsticks dry my lips out. This is the only one I've found that doesn't, so I plan to buy full sizes in all colors!

reviews.headline: Great color, great formula.
reviews.comments: Great color. Goes on smooth. Doesn't dry out lips.

reviews.headline: Mac Lipstick
reviews.comments: Mac Lipsticks are the best but not as good as they were several years ago.  The pigment was better and the lipstick stayed on longer.  I would recommend Mac over the other many lipsticks I have tried.

reviews.headline: I would love to buy it again
reviews.comments: I love the lipstick it does not smear and it last all day

reviews.headline: Great color
reviews.comments: Thus is the first time I have bought a Mac lipstick so this may be my lack of knowledge.  Loved the color and over all the quality was good.  However, I was disappointed is the size of the product I received for the price I paid.  The product gave me throw back memories of Avon Samples.

reviews.headline: Mac is the best
reviews.comments: Matt is the best. This is my first time with this color and it's the best it last forever. I love it.

reviews.headline: Matt is the best for me
reviews.comments: I have no comment it's the best. These are the two new ones I've got but I usually wear Ruby Woo, and that's the best hands-down and it lasts forever

reviews.headline: Perfect Shade/ Longevity
reviews.comments: Perfect shade for my skin complexion. Lasts for most of my work day.

reviews.headline: The perfect NUDE
reviews.comments: The perfect nude color for olive skin tones. Goes on so smooth and hydrating! Very pigmented and beautiful!

reviews.headline: Love it!!
reviews.comments: Beautiful color and goes on smooth, zero suffocation to the lips.

reviews.headline: Beautiful color
reviews.comments: So pretty and vibrant! My husband loved it!

reviews.headline: I would buy this again and again !
reviews.comments: This is my favorite lipstick. The color is perfect. A nice neutral but with some warm tones. I will definitely buy the regular size when I run out

reviews.headline: Velvet Teddy
reviews.comments: Nice lil touch of color without feeling like I'm dressing up. Lips felt moisturized and the compliments were nice.

reviews.headline: Best long lasting mattte
reviews.comments: Love this - color is as it looks and long lasting

reviews.headline: Love this formula
reviews.comments: Exactly as pictured - long lasting - goes on creamy ! I hope it doesn't change

faceoff_positive.comments: I received this for free from BzzAgent in exchange for my honest review. I got the shade 'Diva', a classic MAC shade in the updated formula. Very happy with it overall. Updating formulas and releasing new products is standard so I don't believe it justifies their continual price jumps. That being said, MAC is the OG and I've been a fan of their products for a couple decades at this point.  If you're not familiar with MAC lipsticks, definitely swatch before buying because the packaging doesn't match the shade. Online photos are pretty accurate, keeping in mind the bullet will look darker. Look at swatches. They didn't try to reinvent the wheel, just improved on something good. Formula's a bit thinner, more comfortable, still pigmented and long wearing. 'Diva' is a very wearable deeper red color with plum/berry undertones that looks elegant paired with a neutral eye look. It's like Ruby Woo and Russian Red's more confident sister. Good for a night out, special occasion, or everyday if you're into a 'power' look. Doesn't stray into goth territory easily like 'Sin' does. It went on smoothly and pigmented. So lightweight it felt like a lip balm and I quickly forgot I was wearing it. Lightly moisturizing. Still has that classic vanilla scent I love. Wears away evenly with a bit less transfer than the previous formula. You'll get a solid 4-6 hours of wear or more depending on how messy your meal/snack is. Not kiss proof but if it's just a peck you'll look good as new and they'll barely get a whisper of color. You'll have to touch up after meals for that just applied look but if you don't, you still have a smooth gradient towards the center to a red stain. Looks flawless through drinks. No feathering, but I still prefer it with MAC's lipliner in "Plum" or "Whirl". Definitely recommend.
faceoff_positive.headline: Pretty solid update, price should've stayed the same though

faceoff_negative.comments: I have always heard buzz about Macs lipstick and was so excited to try this out for free. I really thought I would love it, I received the color Chili which is true to the name-a warm brick red in the tube. On the lips it was more pink than expected. At first it glided on smoothly but with each swipe it started dragging across my lips. It definitely would benefit from using a lip liner to keep it neat around the edges. It also highlights every crease, so your lips have to be pretty smooth to start-although that tends to be the norm with matte formulas. My lips felt dry while I was wearing it but soft after I took it off. That was unexpected. I first swatched it on my wrist and then my lips. It didn't even last 5 minutes before what was on my arm transfered to my shirt. It also smudged around really easily. I was disappointed with the lack of lasting power. I can't imagine it staying on while you eat and drink. I love that there's a rainbow of colors to choose from, but can't justify the price if it is not actually going to live up to it's claims.
faceoff_negative.headline: Great color but transfers easily and feels dry
